    • Method Detail

      • auditAs

        public Routers.ServiceRoute auditAs​(AuditConstants.Component component)
        Specifies the audit component to use when auditing requests to the endpoint.

        Can only be set once, attempt to do so twice will result in an IllegalStateException.

        Parameters:
        component - The audit component.
        Returns:
        This route.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If attempted to be set twice.

      • auditAs

        public Routers.ServiceRoute auditAs​(AuditConstants.Component component,
                                    Class<? extends org.forgerock.json.resource.Filter> filterClass)
        Specifies the audit component to use when auditing requests to the endpoint.

        Can only be set once, attempt to do so twice will result in an IllegalStateException.

        Parameters:
        component - The audit component.
        filterClass - The audit filter class.
        Returns:
        This route.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If attempted to be set twice.

      • toService

        public void toService​(org.forgerock.http.routing.RoutingMode mode,
                      Class<? extends org.forgerock.http.Handler> resourceClass)
        Completes the route registration with the resource that requests matching the route should be routed to.

        Using this method to complete the route registration will add a version of 1 into the route.

        Parameters:
        resourceClass - The resource endpoint class.

      • toService

        public void toService​(org.forgerock.http.routing.RoutingMode mode,
                      com.google.inject.Key<?> resourceKey)
        Completes the route registration with the resource that requests matching the route should be routed to.

        Using this method to complete the route registration will add a version of 1 into the route.

        Parameters:
        resourceKey - The resource endpoint key.

      • toService

        public void toService​(org.forgerock.http.routing.RoutingMode mode,
                      Object resource)
        Completes the route registration with the resource that requests matching the route should be routed to.

        Using this method to complete the route registration will add a version of 1 into the route.

        Parameters:
        resource - The resource endpoint instance.
